title: The Kiss of the Cobra (Action, 1986) by Massimo Pirri | Movie

sources.title: The Kiss of the Cobra (Action, 1986) by Massimo Pirri | Movie
sources.description:
Phil Stone, leader and only survivor of "The Scorpions" is desperately in need of money. While scavenging a tomb, he strips a priceless ruby ring from the boney finger of a long dead princess.

Original title: Meglio baciare un cobra (1986) AKA: The Kiss of the Cobra / Mark of the Scorpion

This film is subtitled in many languages.

Director: Massimo Pirri
Writers: Morando Morandini Jr.Massimo Pirri, Tito Giuliani
Stars: Andy J. Forest, Danilo Mattei, Milly D'Abbraccio
Genres: Italian cinema, Action, Adventure
